verbs.description: [ARG0: The anchor] [ARGM-TMP: momentarily] [V: referred] [ARG1: to the authoritarian - curious Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong - un] [ARG2: as “ the two dictators ”] [ARGM-TMP: during a live segment following the president ’s arrival in Singapore] .

The anchor momentarily referred to the authoritarian - curious Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong - un as “ the two dictators ” during [ARG1: a live segment] [V: following] [ARG2: the president ’s arrival in Singapore] .
